summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating that Epstein will be out of touch until 10 AM. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating he will be unavailable until a specified time.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are in communication, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email indicates that Jeffrey Epstein will be out of touch until 10 AM.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email contains a warning against unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying.
